message: Welcome to the Spectra family <3

story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur added 22 new photos — at IIT Kharagpur.
message: A collaboration with the Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur where the alumni and their families sat down and painted their fond memories and interacted with the current students of IIT Kgp.

Love creating art?
Spectra- The Fine Arts and Design Group of IIT Kharagpur is excited to bring in new members in the family.
So if you are passionate about art - in any form (Traditional, Digital or Photography) and  eager to learn more, then come for selections on Monday, 20th of August.
Inviting 1st and 2nd year students for the selections. Bring your previous artworks - soft copy/hard copy - with you if possible.
Link to the registration- https://tinyurl.com/Spectra101
Mail your entries to spectra.iitkgp@gmail.com.
Create. Make. Art.
❤️

Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur  is organising Art Attack in association with Spectra, IIT Kharagpur. This is a painting competition to be held in Bhatnagar Auditorium (F116) from 5 PM onwards for both students and Alumni! Students have to bring their own paint while the sheets for the painting will be provided by us.
So, come and enjoy an evening full of colours! <3

story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur added 22 new photos — with Aahan Tiwari and 10 others at IIT Kharagpur.
message: The Cartooning Workshop conducted recently by Spectra, IIT Kharagpur saw an enthusiastic participation from the students. Here are the snaps from yesterday's event. Stay tuned for many more such workshops.

story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur is with Nastassja Rai and Abhishek Mhatre at IIT Kharagpur.
message:
Ever tried to doodle characters and have struggled to start or something just seems amiss?

Spectra, IIT Kharagpur invites all the budding artists, hobbyist and aspiring cartoonist to come and learn the basics of CREATING and self-publishing COMICS!
Bring out that artistic child within you and give flight to your imagination and have lots and lots of fun. :) 
We'll see you all at S301, Main Building on 11th August. Be on time, so that you don't miss anything.

story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur is with Siddharth Jindal at Netaji Auditorium, IIT KGP.
message: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur was honoured to present a glimpse of the Art Culture in IIT Kharagpur as a part of the Cultural Program conducted in the Induction Program for freshers. The students were introduced to the diverse art forms prevailing in the campus as well as various workshops and exhibitions conducted round-the-year.
